summary: Adds a craftable Morrowind sword to the game
descriptionHtml:
Time for a bit of nostalgia?

This Mod adds craftable versions of the glass longsword that was in Morrowind. You will need the smithing glass perk to make it.

The sword has a slightly higher damage than the standard glass swords in Skyrim.

This is my first mod for Skyrim. I will probably be doing more versions of some of the glass weapons that you used to get.

Thanks for checking it out

Richy
author: Richy
